name: PrimaryButton
description: A primary button component with customizable text and onClick handler.

props.name: onClick
props.description: Function to call when the button is clicked

state.name: isHovered
state.description: Whether the button is being hovered

state.name: isPressed
state.description: Whether the button is being pressed

functionality: The button should handle click events and show different styles based on its variant and size. It should also have hover and pressed states.
styling: The button should use Tailwind CSS for styling. It should have different styles for each variant and size. The primary variant should have a solid background color, the secondary variant should have a lighter background color, and the outline variant should have a border with no background color.
